row.Docu:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.ACTION.MOVE = General description = Moves a file or a directory. Support relative, UNC or absolute path in both target and source path. Wildcard support (*,?) could be effective on both filename and directory name of source only.
= Note = On windows platform, action will be failed if overwrite option has been set to "No" and file/directory already exist as specified by target path.
= Inputs = Source directory/file name: name of source directory or file to move Source files/directories name (Wildcard Supported): Specify comma separated files/directories. Also supported wildcard patterns. E.g. Myfile.txt, Sample*.txt, *.log, UCB* Target directory/file name: name of target directory or file Overwrite existing: overwrite if target file(s) is exist
= Behavior = Move file/directory or rename file Wildcard not supported inside parameter [Source files/directories name (Wildcard Supported)] when Source path is a file
= Outputs = (none)
= Return Value = 0 - File(s)/Directory(s) was moved successfully Other - Invalid data or action has been failed
= Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none)
= Example = 1. Move file to file Source directory/file name: C:\src\test.txt Source files/directories name (Wildcard Supported): Target directory/file name: C:\dst\dst_test.txt Overwrite existing: YES
Output: C:\dst C:\dst\test.txt
2. Move file to file Source directory/filename: C:\temp\Details.txt Source files/directories name(regex supported): Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: NO
Output: The Details.txt file of C:\temp dir is moved into C:\temp1 without overwriting existing files.
3. Move directory to directory Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: YES
Output: All content of C:\temp is moved into C:\temp1.
4. Move directory to directory Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: NO
Output: All content of C:\temp is moved into C:\temp1 without overwriting existing files.
5. Move all file with wildcard(*.txt) from source to target Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): *.txt Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: YES
Output: All *.txt files of C:\temp are moved into C:\temp1.
6. Move all file with wildcard(*.txt) from source to target Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): *.txt Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: NO
Output: All *.txt files of C:\temp are moved into C:\temp1 without overwriting existing files.
7. Move all file of directory with wildcard supported (QA*) from source to target Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): QA* Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: YES
Output: All contents of 'QA*' directory of C:\temp are moved into C:\temp1 and remove all directories 'QA*' of C:\temp in case it's empty. Example :
D:\Kapil\Email\TEST123\Source\testingInfo\HRA 2019.pdf D:\Kapil\Email\TEST123\Source\testingInfo\sqljdbc42.jar D:\Kapil\Email\TEST123\Source\testingInfo\sqlTest.sql D:\Kapil\Email\TEST123\Source\testingInfo\EST\patest.pdf D:\Kapil\Email\TEST123\Source\testingInfo\EST\powershell.ps1 D:\Kapil\Email\TEST123\Source\testingInfo\EST\st.txt
8. Move all file of directory with wildcard supported (QA*) from source to target Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): QA* Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: NO
Output: All contents of 'QA*' directory of C:\temp are moved into C:\temp1 without overwriting existing files and remove all directories 'QA*' of C:\temp in case it's empty.
9. Move all file of directory with wildcard supported (QA*) from source and all file with wildcard(*.txt) from source to target Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): QA*,*.txt Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: YES
Output: All *.txt files of C:\temp and all contents of 'QA*' directory of C:\temp\ are moved into C:\temp1. Remove all directories 'QA*' of C:\temp in case it's empty
10. Move all file of directory with wildcard supported (QA*) from source and all file with wildcard(*.txt) from source to target Source directory/filename: C:\temp Source files/directories name(regex supported): QA*,*.txt Target directory/filename: C\temp1 Overwrite existing: NO
Output: All *.txt files of C:\temp and all contents of 'QA' directory of C:\temp\ are moved into C:\temp1 without overwriting existing files. Remove all directories 'QA*' of C:\temp in case it's empty
